description: From Middle French dynastie, from Late Latin dynastia, from Ancient Greek δυναστεία (dunasteía, “power, dominion”).

entries.meaning: A series of rulers or dynasts from one family.
(East Asian history) The polity or historical era under the rule of a certain dynasty.
examples: During the Ming dynasty, China was ruled by the Zhu family.

entries.meaning: (sports) A team or organization which has an extended period of success or dominant performance.
